text: Martha Wright, born Martha Lucile Wiederrecht (March 23, 1923 â€“ March 1, 2016), was an American actress and singer. She performed on Broadway and on television. She was in South Pacific and The Sound of Music. Wright died at the age of 92 in Newburyport, Massachusetts on March 1, 2016.Weber, Bruce.
